name: Spicy Sambal Shrimp
author: LaurenSyd
summary: A spicy pan-seared shrimp dish flavored with sambal oelek.
ingredients: 1 pound large frozen shrimp, tails removed
3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
½ cup sambal oelek (Indonesian red chile paste)
directions: Place shrimp in a large bowl of cold water until thawed, 10 to 15 minutes
Melt 1/2 cup butter in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in the microwave in 15-second intervals, 30 seconds to 1 minute
Mix in garlic and half the lemon juice
Melt 1 1/2 teaspoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Add onion; cook and stir until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add shrimp, garlic butter mixture, and sambal oelek
Cook and stir until garlic is cooked and shrimp are heated through, 7 to 8 minutes
Bring water and sushi rice to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 15 minutes
Remove from heat, and let stand, covered, until liquid has been absorbed, about 10 minutes
Serve shrimp over rice, topped with remaining lemon juice and green onions
